Modelling with continuous responses

Introduction to Statistics with R

Emi Tanaka

19th February 2025

These slides are best viewed on a modern browser like Google Chrome on a desktop or laptop. Some interactive components may require some time to fully load.

Revisting wheat seed morphological traits

  • 190 seeds selected at random from a line of diploid wheat, Triticum monococcum for several morphological traits:
    • weight (mg),
    • length (mm),
    • diameter (mm),
    • moisture content (%), and
    • endosperm hardness (single-kernel characterization system index value).

Exploring multivariate or multivariable data

  • Multivariate data: multiple dependent variables.

  • Multivariable data: multiple independent variables.

  • What is independent and dependent variable can be context specific!
